game.title: The Quest to Save the Kingdom
game.objective: Find the hidden treasure in the Enchanted Forest
game.description: Your quest begins at the village square, where the wise old wizard tells you about a magical artifact needed to defeat the evil sorcerer.

task.objective: Explore the village for clues about the enchanted artifact's location
task.description: Speak with villagers, search the local marketplace, and examine the village map.
